## Publications - change google id here
pubs <- scholar::get_publications("8aKD8FoAAAAJ") %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(author = author %>% 
                  as.character %>% 
                  stringr::str_trim(),
                journal = journal %>% 
                  replace(journal %in% "bioRxiv", "BioRxiv"), 
                first_author = case_when(stringr::str_starts(author, "S Abbott") ~ TRUE,
                                         TRUE ~ FALSE),
                preprint = case_when(journal %in% c("bioRxiv", "BioRxiv") ~ TRUE,
                                         TRUE ~ FALSE)) %>% 
  dplyr::arrange(desc(year))

**Non-first author**

```{r}
pubs %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!first_author, !preprint) %>% 
  detailed_entries(
    what = title,
    when = year,
    with = author,
    where = journal,
    .protect = TRUE
  )
```

**Preprints**

```{r}
pubs %>% 
  dplyr::filter(preprint) %>% 
  detailed_entries(
    what = title,
    when = year,
    with = author,
    where = journal, 
    .protect = TRUE
  )
```

*Updated programmatically each week. See [here](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=8aKD8FoAAAAJ=en) for DOIs and citation details.*
